title: Hyperparameter Optimization with Keras for the Iris Prediction.ipynb error
body:
- [X ] I'm up-to-date with the latest release:
          
- I'm using Talos example notebook (Hyperparameter Optimization with Keras for the Iris Prediction.ipynb on Windows 10
A Very Short Introduction to Hyperparameter Optimization of Keras Models with Talos sample is worked

Error cell: 
h = ta.Scan(x, y, params=p,
            model=iris_model,
            dataset_name='iris',
            experiment_no='1',
            grid_downsample=.01)

---------------------------------------------------------------------------
TypeError                                 Traceback (most recent call last)
C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\talos\scan\scan_round.py in scan_round(self)
     31     try:
---> 32         _hr_out, self.keras_model = ingest_model(self)
     33     except TypeError as err:

C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\talos\model\ingest_model.py in ingest_model(self)
      9                       self.y_val,
---> 10                       self.round_params)

<ipython-input-4-125f26e8ea75> in iris_model(x_train, y_train, x_val, y_val, params)
     23                     validation_data=[x_val, y_val],
---> 24                     callbacks=early_stopper(params['epochs'], mode='strict'))
     25 

C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\keras\engine\training.py in fit(self, x, y, batch_size, epochs, verbose, callbacks, validation_split, validation_data, shuffle, class_weight, sample_weight, initial_epoch, steps_per_epoch, validation_steps, **kwargs)
   1038                                         steps_per_epoch=steps_per_epoch,
-> 1039                                         validation_steps=validation_steps)
   1040

    105                 stateful_metrics=model.stateful_metric_names))
--> 106     _callbacks += (callbacks or []) + [model.history]
    107     callbacks = cbks.CallbackList(_callbacks)

TypeError: unsupported operand type(s) for +: 'EarlyStopping' and 'list'

During handling of the above exception, another exception occurred:

TalosReturnError                          Traceback (most recent call last)

      4             experiment_no='1',
----> 5             grid_downsample=.01)

    162 
--> 163         self._null = self.runtime()
    164 
    165     def runtime(self):

    166 
    167         self = scan_prepare(self)
--> 168         self = scan_run(self)

C:\ProgramData\Anaconda3\lib\site-packages\talos\scan\scan_run.py in scan_run(self)

---> 20         self = scan_round(self)
